actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A bill to amend the Foreign Assistance Act of 1974 to increase the amount of assistance available to South Vietnamese, Cambodian, and Laotian children.

summary.text: Declares it to be the sense of the Congress under the Foreign Assistance Act that inadequate provision has been made for the improvement of health and welfare programs and facilities for the benefit of children of Southeast Asia, and for the adoption by United States citizens of such children. Authorizes to be appropriated $25,000,000 (presently $10,000,000) to carry out the provisions of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Foreign Assistance Act of 1974 to increase the amount of assistance available to South Vietnamese, Cambodian, and Laotian children.
